articles.description: The city building department reportedly logged as many as 24 complaints about the bright X, which was erected last week | World News
articles.content:
Agiant X sign that marked the spot whereElon Musk's messaging companys headquarters is situated in San Francisco is gone. The company, previously known as Twitter, has now been renamed X.
